domainLayer

Interface BagInterface<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic type to be specified during usage.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bag

    public interface BagInterface<T>
    A Bag interface of generic describing the operations of the market basket.
    Author:
    Ben-Malik_Gorkem

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T newEntry)
      Adds a new entry to the bag.
      void clear()
      Clears the entire bag.
      boolean contains(T anEntry)
      Checks whether a specific entry is contained in the bag.
      int getBagCapacity()
      Detects the current capacity of the bag.
      int getBagSize()
      Gets the number of entries currently in the bag.
      int getFrequencyOf(T anEntry)
      Gets the frequency of an entry in the bag if it does exist.
      T grab()
      Removes any random entry from the bag, if exists.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Sees whether the bag is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • getBagSize

        int getBagSize()
        Gets the number of entries currently in the bag.
        Returns:
        the integer number of the current entries that are in the bag.

      • add

        void add(T newEntry)
        Adds a new entry to the bag.
        Parameters:
        newEntry - The object to be added as a new entry.

      • grab

        T grab()
throws EmptyBagException
        Removes any random entry from the bag, if exists.
        Returns:
        Either the removed entry if any, or null.
        Throws:
        EmptyBagException - if the bag is empty.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Sees whether the bag is empty.
        Returns:
        True if the bag is empty, and false otherwise.

      • clear

        void clear()
    throws EmptyBagException
        Clears the entire bag.
        Throws:
        EmptyBagException - if the bag is empty during operation.

      • contains

        boolean contains(T anEntry)
          throws EmptyBagException
        Checks whether a specific entry is contained in the bag.
        Parameters:
        anEntry - The object whose existence in the bag is to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the entry is found in the bag and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        EmptyBagException - if the bag is empty during operation.

      • getFrequencyOf

        int getFrequencyOf(T anEntry)
            throws EmptyBagException
        Gets the frequency of an entry in the bag if it does exist.
        Parameters:
        anEntry - The object whose frequency is to be looked for.
        Returns:
        The integer number of the specific object's frequency.
        Throws:
        EmptyBagException - if the bag is empty during operation.

      • getBagCapacity

        int getBagCapacity()
        Detects the current capacity of the bag.
        Returns:
        the integer number of the bag's capacity.
